text: hi everyone today i will share with you
my favorite gingerbread cookie recipe
this is probably the most popular
christmas cookie recipe that i loved by
both kids and adults they are simple to
make looks great when decorated and
tastes amazing every time
let's get baking
you will need 120 grams of brown sugar
200 gram bread flour 190 grams of
all-purpose flour 120 gram of sifted
powdered sugar 1 egg 145 gram of
unsalted butter some vanilla extract
salt ginger powder cinnamon powder
baking soda fine spice powder and chili
powder first speed up the unsalted
butter until fluffy add brown sugar and
beat until combined crack in the eggs
and mix in quickly then add a teaspoon
of vanilla extract and mix well
in a large mixing bowl combine the bread
and all-purpose flour a teaspoon of
baking soda half a teaspoon salt a
teaspoon of cinnamon powder a teaspoon
of ginger powder half a teaspoon of fine
spice powder and half a teaspoon of
chili powder
then sift the flour mixture into the
butter mixture in 3 additions mix well
to combine
when you finish adding all the flour
knit with your hands until the dough is
formed wrap the dough with some saran
wrap and chill in the fridge for about
20 minutes
preheat the oven at 175 degrees celsius
or 350 fahrenheit
take out the dough and roll into a disc
about 1 centimeter thick use cookie
cutters to cut out the shape that you
like i have some christmas tree star and
flower cookie cutter here when finished
bake the cookies for about 8 to 11
minutes depending on the size when your
kitchen is filled with amazing fragrance
and the cookies is right to the chest
that's when it's done leave to comb
before decorating to make the icing for
the cookie separate the egg and gather
the egg white in a bowl
place the bowl over a saucepan of
boiling water so well over medium low
heat to pasteurize the egg when it's
warm to the touch you can take off the
heat beat up the egg white and then add
120 gram of powdered sugar add in
gradually and bake well then add a
teaspoon of vanilla extract when you can
get this consistency is good transfer
the icing to a piping bag and decorate
the cookies as you wish decorating
gingerbread cookies in this one of the
most pleasing activities that you can do
with your kids it's a way to show off
their creativity and i'm sure you will
have a great time together ginger press
cookies are so cute my version is crispy
on the outside and still soft on the
inside it smells amazing of all the
beautiful spices cinnamon first pie
powder and ginger but i'm sure your kids
can enjoy them my daughter emmy is 3
years old but she can enjoy these
cookies with no problem so they're not
spicy at all i hope you enjoyed the
holiday seasons and the celebrations of
three union thank you for watching and i
will see you next time bye
you
